ygData.subject: Bard vs Wizard race?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Since the Caster can pay someone else to help him, then I will pay someone to help me.  /auction Need a group gate to Qeynos . ... If the race was
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Fri, 1 Oct 1999 09:07:48 -0600
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> Subject: RE: RE: Hey this sounded interesting.. *Time to KABOING ??*
>
> I'd be interested in seeing the results of a caster
> and a bard racing from Freeport to Qeynos and back.
> I can see it now. Caster pays 1pp for SOW and nearly
> keeps up with bard.

Since the Caster can pay someone else to help him, then I will pay someone
to help me. "/auction Need a group gate to Qeynos".


> Bard arrives in Qeynos let's
> be generous and say 10 minutes before wizard does.
> Bard heads back and gleefully waves at wizard still
> on his way to Qeynos. Wizard gets to Qeynos. Wizard
> gates back to Freeport and laughs it up for 45 minutes
> while the bard is still running.

If the race was serious, the bard could just suicide against a guard and be
instantly teleported right back to Freeport, beating the wizard. Put all
your stuff in the bank first to make it easier. And if you are worried
about the experience loss, kill yourself instead. No exp loss there.

> Or better yet, high level bard & high level wizard in
> the same race. Bard takes off a runnin'.. Wizard does
> his fancy teleport to the Karana's. Runs rest of way
> to Qeynos. Gates back to Freeport. Bard arrives in West
> Commons on his way to Qeynos.
>
> Yeah, Selo's makes up for all of that.

But a wizard will never be able to heal himself. If you think Selo is the
only thing bards have going for them.....



Wayne
